column1: I’m grateful for our wonderful Tampa community & the opportunity to serve as your voice in Congress. I am especially inspired by the way our community has come together to support each other throughout the #COVID19 pandemic. Please enjoy a healthy safe & #HappyThanksgiving🍁🦃❤️ https://t.co/cL3NJr4LW6

Las pequeñas empresas han sentido el dolor económico causado por la pandemia del coronavirus. Este sábado celebramos el #SmallBusinessSaturday para animar a nuestros vecinos a comprar sus regalos navideños en las pequeñas empresas y apoyar a nuestra comunidad empresaria local. https://t.co/KXZ3RRKKC0

Thank you @60Minutes for showcasing our heroic social workers at @HillsboroughSch who are doing their best to track down the 7k students who didn’t return to school due to #COVID19. We care about each and every student in our community.   Watch: https://t.co/goJARWRawO
🚨#Covid19 aggressively spreading in #TampaBay counties 😷 #Tampa 😷 #Hillsborough 😷 https://t.co/TbCFKCkBUt

Pleased to report that the House passed my bill to help the travel &tourism industries bounce back after #COVID19. @HouseDemocrats remain committed to sending aid to families businesses schools hospitals &frontline workers.  More in my HouseWatch Alert: https://t.co/gtt3bsiAF6

Good news: my bipartisan measure to help alleviate the burden of #COVID19 on the tourism travel & hospitality industries & our neighbors who rely on those jobs just passed the House.   We can create a plan to help these industries & workers bounce back. More here👇 https://t.co/w6OtfmlfrE

Our students &educators need support as we grapple w #COVID19 so I'm proud to support @RepJahanaHayes’ #SaveEducationJobsAct to aid learning avoid teacher layoffs & support our economy. Our bill is an impt commitment to these frontline heroes + students. https://t.co/Vtgu4MCq6A

It’s irresponsible.   It’s another move by Governor DeSantis to obscure the full data on #COVID infections and deaths in #Florida. ... data we need to operate business and schools safely and protect our families. https://t.co/q1NlVEAUBD

👉 #Florida families will suffer if Pres Trump Gov DeSantis and AG Ashley Moody prevail in Supreme Ct push to end #ACA. 2 million Floridians have affordable coverage through ACA marketplace + millions more w preexisting condition like COVID-19 are covered as well #ProtectOurCare https://t.co/AUIltEXQ70

Far too many families continue to struggle with opioid addiction & #COVID19 has exacerbated this public health crisis.   That's why @RepMcKinley and I introduced bipartisan legislation to equip @DEAHQ with tools to hold drug distributors manufacturers & pharmacies accountable. https://t.co/qPKq052nZi

NEW: @COVIDOversight released a report on investigations into the Trump Admin’s failed coronavirus pandemic response calling it among the “worst failures of leadership in American history.”   Read the full release here ⬇️  https://t.co/rq0Jxh0hlU

Very concerning! @NPR reports that the admin is hiding #COVID19 data that would help health experts &potentially save lives. I introed the #ETHICAct last mth to give states localities & #CDC resources they need to boost public health data systems& accurately/publicly report data
Health experts advise that contact tracing is critical to crushing #COVID19 and I will continue to work to provide the resources #Florida needs to get us through this.

I urge @GovRonDeSantis not to weaken/eliminate #COVID19 contact tracing- health experts say we need to expand it. It'd be short-sighted &reckless not control the spread. Covid will not ‘just disappear'- we must work together to prevent&control the spread. https://t.co/W3zknxT2Wy

During #COVID19 @MetroMinistries is working tirelessly to keep food on the table for neighbors in what'll be a difficult holiday season for many. If you’re looking for a way to serve or need food assistance see more about their holiday donation tent: https://t.co/rNYqbgqo1j
Cases are rising so please do your part to mitigate #COVID19 and keep people safe from contracting the virus in the first place. 😷

COVID19 Health Update: Experts advise that damage to lungs heart and/or brain may be longer-lasting than we understand. We need more medical research on “long haulers” and the full impact COVID19 on our health.  https://t.co/asoXrafhvI

The #COVID19 threat is still severe + cases continue to rise in Florida. Let’s all follow #CDC guidelines wear a mask and social distance whenever possible. It’ll take all of us working together in order to crush the virus and stay safe.   https://t.co/TcVnj9yJZL

Trump views the deadly coronavirus as his personal PR problem rather than a public health crisis.    He “downplays” covid while the U.S. has highest death rate among developed countries.   His failure to listen to public health experts is costing all of us https://t.co/ZeGXwcTnWM

Local leaders deserve a strong fed partner to create clean energy jobs in and protect small biz from climate-fueled disasters.   We have a plan to invest in communities&bounce back from #covid19 and its economic fallout - together. #SolvingTheClimateCrisis https://t.co/86OiVDxUbB

While @HouseDemocrats passed legislation to #FundTheFrontlines and meet the needs of our neighbors the Senate GOP and Pres Trump won’t act to pass critical #COVID19 aid. Pass the #HeroesAct now to help our hardworking neighbors like Ozie @AFSCME! https://t.co/ht62t3DQbU
|Florida Approaching 750000 Coronavirus Cases 16000 Deaths || WUSF Public Media https://t.co/O7BkWZw8qQ|

Our #Florida neighbors who work in restaurants hospitality & tourism have been hit hard by the economic fallout of #COVID19 so introduced bipartisan bill to target emergency aid to small biz &their employees who are hurting &shared on @FoxBusiness. @ConnellMcShane @AfterTheBell https://t.co/1B1K9xzYPp

Impt info regarding college financial aid! COVID-19 its economic fallout may put higher education out of reach for many students. A college degree is the surest path to higher wages and attaining the American Dream especially for students from working class families. https://t.co/sS9vS1UX4b

Thank you to our frontline heroes at @TGHCares who are working tirelessly to care for our neighbors during the #COVID19 crisis. I’ve done my best to speed resources & $ to local hospitals & clinics and press for a comprehensive plan to crush the virus. https://t.co/1SjMLn2oC1

Rep. Castor: Florida’s online voter registration failure is a ‘black eye’ for Gov. DeSantis state.   “This comes on the heels of a very questionable coronavirus strategy and [a] failed website for unemployed Floridians ... https://t.co/p4aENkZlXG

Trump chaos continues to reign- it’s costing lives & $.  Despite the plan by @HouseDemocrats to crush #COVID19 &provide emergency aid GOP blocks progress. This on same day that Fed Chair Powell said aggressive action is needed to to recover from #COVID19.  Only a few days apart: https://t.co/IUjJTrxZB6

⏰ Wake up call to GOP Senators! Fed Chair Jerome Powell advised today that aggressive action from Congress is needed to boost the U.S. economy during #COVID19. The House passed 2 versions of the #HeroesAct to deliver relief to families & small businesses + control the virus.

I urge my Senate colleagues to pass the #HeroesAct and help us provide emergency aid to those who are in need....  ...and pass a comprehensive plan to control #coronavirus so that  people can go back to work and students can attend school safely!

The updated #HeroesAct provides emergency aid for students teachers &education incl K-12 schools colleges & universities  + help for struggling families to help pay rent & mortgages  + UI & add’l direct payments to families to cushion the economic blow of coronavirus. https://t.co/Av5VCFnuqQ
Tune in to this important hearing with public health experts re #Covid19 vaccine incl @ashishkjha @helenegayle. @usfcoph @USFHealth @HealthyFla https://t.co/aRQfOprnPv

👉 @FlyTPA + @BayCare are partnering to keep TPA safe for travelers + expanding access to #COVID19 testing that benefits all.    Read more on their new partnership & how to get tested while visiting here: https://t.co/QDsUJgskyE

Most U.S. Households Struck By COVID-19 Suffer Financially Too  In other news Trump paid nothing in U.S. income taxes for 10 years but still felt entitled to deduct $70000 for his personal hairstyling (!) & pay shady “consulting” fees 😡 https://t.co/k0UpvwAY6j

Don’t let the president signing a piece of paper a month before the election fool you- he’s fought tooth&nail to rip away health care from our neighbors. Trump &the Senate failed to #LowerDrugCosts as the House fought for & failed to listen to health experts to control #covid19. https://t.co/jOoQ2gpG5C

During the #Covid-19 pandemic the #ACA has been a lifeline for affordable health coverage and provided financial security at a time of uncertainty. A Court ruling that ends the ACA would take away health coverage from Americans whose lives already are disrupted and distressed.

Trump & his associates didn’t just ignore scientists & public health experts re #Covid19 they actively bullied & intimidated them.  How many lives were lost due to the Trump lies & misinformation campaign?  ⁦@CDCDirector⁩ ⁦@SecretaryAzar⁩   https://t.co/xnirK3bUzR

A bipartisan coalition of congressional reps urged Pres Trump to aid #PuertoRico following Hurricane Maria in 2017 to little avail. He stalled health care housing & electricity. He even downplayed the horrific death toll just as he’s doing w Covid-19.   Trump is no friend to 🇵🇷

@KHayhoe The stakes could not be higher this election... not political stakes but our way of life. They’ve ignored science of Covid-19 & of the climate crisis. It’s cost lives.  +They’re untethered to the moral obligation we have to future generations.   #science #SolvingtheClimateCrisis

Months into the COVID-19 pandemic I am continuing to work hand-in-hand with Mayor @JaneCastor to aid our neighbors and ensure families stay afloat.  Read more about an additional $3M in #CARESAct emergency aid headed to #Tampa: https://t.co/QbwrqFUd6c

In the midst of the #COVID19 pandemic as many are serving on the frontlines to keep us safe & healthy we are grateful for your work and buoyed by the protections achieved through your organized efforts.

Friendly reminder to #MaskUp to help control #COVID: Take care of your families & neighbors with the seriousness & vigor in which polio was defeated. COVID-19 has already killed 50 times more Americans than died from polio in that epidemic’s worst year.  https://t.co/aMRcmyysCs

Families also need the Pres to work to control the virus! The chaotic COVID response has made it hard for many schools to reopen safely. The House passed #HeroesAct w $ to reopen schools safely but @SenateGOP is refusing to provide $ needed to make classrooms safe. #FamiliesFirst

So important @FentriceForFL for students and teachers during COVID-19!  It’s not acceptable that some kids are at a disadvantage due to the technology gap.  The #HeroesAct would provide emergency $ for WiFi & equipment for students teachers + unlimited data. https://t.co/tK3rU3pAjn

It'll help us understand the impact #COVID19 has wreaked on travel &tourism for future planning. I’m pleased to work on this bipartisan bill w @RepFredUpton- we hear the concerns of our neighbors &are acting to bring solutions to bolster this economic engine for #FL & the nation.
Live now with @Bay_Area_Legal discussing how small businesses can recover from #COVID19!  Tune in: https://t.co/b09UHA9BSL
Joining @Bay_Area_Legal today at 12pm for a conversation on how #smallbiz can recover from the #COVID19 pandemic.  Details: https://t.co/hc2RZo4Psu

I’ve never seen such a weak President -someone who divides and distracts from 180000 dead Americans ignores escalating climate costs and fails to care about people out of work.  @realDonaldTrump where’s your national #COVID19 strategy? Why do you keep hiding info people need?

Thank you Maria!    My constituent service team is working tirelessly to serve our neighbors throughout the #COVID19 pandemic and beyond. If you’re in need of assistance with a federal agency or other matter please contact my office at 813-871-2817. https://t.co/pJP3H5v0FA

🇺🇸 Americans expect a strong and efficient ⁦@USPS⁩ especially during COVID-19. My vote today in favor of #DeliveringForAmericaAct will prohibit degradation in service and ensure reliable delivery of the U.S. Mail 📫📦 #SaveTheUSPS https://t.co/FM7iqCNQAd

I’m inspired by doctors who are committed to the health & well being of all of us in the midst of #COVID19 & the climate crisis. Thanks @PSRFlorida for working on solutions and endorsing the @climatecrisis action plan.

📫📦 #TampaBay values and relies on #USMail for deliveries medicine supplies and vote-by-mail ballots. I won’t let ⁦@realDonaldTrump⁩ undermine our postal service!  I’ll stand up for my neighbors during covid19 and every day 🔥 #DontMessWithUSPS  https://t.co/qsotkYKoD7

Immunizations are critical to safeguarding public health. The Community Immunity During COVID-19 Act promotes vaccinations esp in underserved communities during the pandemic. W/ @MoffittNews I spearheaded an effort to ⬆️HPV vaccinations &have seen the value of outreach&education

We aren’t getting the #COVID19 data we need to control the virus🦠Health experts across the country are raising alarm over the Trump admin’s changes to reporting. In Congress I'm working to ensure you get the best info &relieve undue burdens on hospitals. https://t.co/HnE1kjvdHg

Social Security has survived for 85 years and is a vital lifeline to our older neighbors especially during this #COVID19 pandemic. I am fighting the president’s dangerous attempt to defund Social Security and working to ensure it remains stable and available for our children.

Latinas are disproportionately impacted by the COVID pandemic.   It is critical we ensure vulnerable communities most impacted by COVID receive the support they need to make it through this crisis.   It’s time for Senate Republicans to do their job & pass the #HeroesAct! https://t.co/Z10a7PgADe

Their health impacts are exacerbated by air pollution unsafe water systems and the climate crisis. People of color and those on the frontlines also are more exposed to COVID-19. Thanks to @CEHN and pediatrician @drcandicemd policymakers have the tools to do something about it.

Thank you ltr carriers & postal workers! You are our lifelines especially during Covid. You safely deliver medications ballots & our cherished mail.  I am not going to let Trump & Republicans undermine our postal service. That’s why we have support for USPS in the #HEROESAct.

How can we save lives + $ at the same time #Florida? Expand Medicaid!  During #COVID19 it would be compassionate+ financially-wise.  ~840K Floridians would gain health coverage &it puts the state&hospitals on better financial footing w/o making big cuts. https://t.co/RoPJaZbwbk

👉 @USFHealth students are helping contain the spread of #COVID19. #HometownHeroes like Arshiya Adriana and Hunter are working the frontlines of this public health crisis through contact tracing across Florida.  https://t.co/py5uMv8UmB

It’s another sad record for Florida coronavirus reported deaths - 253 more Floridians dead. Why won’t Trump and DeSantis establish a coordinated plan to control the virus? It’s a total abdication of leadership.

🚨Our Florida hospitals are sounding the alarm - more testing supplies are urgently needed to stop the #COVID19 pandemic.  I wrote @HHS_ASH today urging him to increase production and delivery of these critical supplies immediately + in a sustained fashion.  Read my letter here: https://t.co/EJVfR8qnTo

How many people are going to have to die before @realDonaldTrump & #Florida @GovRonDeSantis implement a coordinated plan to control and defeat the #COVID19 virus?!  @HouseDemocrats directed resources for widespread rapid testing tracing & isolation plan + supplies in #HEROESAct https://t.co/L00v7eG9HO

Millions of parents were struggling to find affordable child care before the coronavirus pandemic.   Our bill that's on the House Floor today will make quality child care more accessible for working families in #Tampa. #SaveChildCare https://t.co/4f7qwBq83m

Parents w children need help during the #COVID19 crisis- I’m cosponsoring the Child Care for Economic Recovery Act to: 👪Help more low + middle-income families afford care  🏫Support providers struggling financially from coronavirus 💵Strengthen our local economy #SaveChildCare

Senate Republicans left yesterday for the weekend rather stay &work on emergency aid for families.  The $600/wk federal UI expires next week. The moratorium on evictions expires. And the coordinated plan to control #COVID19 is being ignored by Senate Republicans &the White House.

The House has been extraordinarily productive lately + is focused on additional #COVID19 emergency aid and moving the National Defense Authorization Act FY2021 appropriations bills + justice-focused legislation.   Read more in this week's HouseWatch👇 https://t.co/tbyanpaTwQ

👉Today’s funding bill reflects @HouseDemocrats’ values + priorities:  🇺🇸Support for our service members veterans & their families 🌊Safeguarding our environment 🍎Food security for our neighbors  🌎Reinstating funding for the worldwide fight against #COVID19 https://t.co/3tz5fIT4bO

My co-chairs and I heard from @USSOCOM re #COVID19 impacts on special forces + their families. I join my #Tampa neighbors in thanking these brave men + women who are the Tip of the Spear in the world’s most dangerous places to keep us all safe! 🇺🇸

😔 My ❤️ goes out to #Florida families who have lost loved ones to #COVID19.  It’s not too late for Trump and GOP to join @HouseDemocrats in a coordinated plan to control the virus as we passed in #HEROESAct.   We could save lives and not become numb to devastating numbers. https://t.co/AoP3h1ab1k

Without an overarching plan to control the virus & flatten #Covid19 curve based on sound public health measures #Florida will continue to struggle.  Other countries have done it. We can too w leadership widespread/rapid tests etc.  Then we can return to school & work safely. https://t.co/lLFstzfCq5

Payroll tax cuts harm the Medicare and Social Security trust funds that we need to provide health care and basic support. Plus if you have lost your job due to coronavirus you will not benefit from a payroll tax cut.

#COVID19 aid provided to communities schools & furloughed workers is running out. The House passed the #HeroesAct to provide another round of aid but we have been waiting for the Senate & President to weigh in. Now Trump is digging in his heels & insisting on a payroll tax cut.

The bipartisan governors underscored that we have a nationwide problem with standardization and public reporting of COVID-19 data. This is crucial information needed to save lives in the months ahead.

The State of Florida’s #COVID19 testing plan was due to HHS 30 days after the enactment of H.R. 266. The bill was signed into law on April 24 2020.  Today I wrote @GovRonDeSantis urging him to release the State's plan to protect Floridians and ensure transparency. https://t.co/YDYzeERvMs

Many of our #Tampa neighbors are struggling to pay rent &put food on the table due to no fault of their own during the #COVID19 pandemic. Florida’s moratorium on evictions ends in less than 24 hrs. Im calling on the governor to extend the emergency order to protect all Floridians

🥀 The somber milestone of 100000 U.S. #COVID19 dead and the disturbing distinction that U.S. has more infections and deaths than any other country requires reflection and action.   Each one is a daughter or a son some mothers or fathers whose life was cut short by this virus.
